articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulations to Lao President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulations to Lao President
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Sunday sent a congratulatory message to Choummaly Sayasone, president of Laos.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend warm congratulations and comradely greetings to you on your 80th birthday.
					
					 I am pleased that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties and two countries provided by the preceding leaders are steadily growing stronger through the joint struggle to defend and realize the idea of socialism. 
					
					 I sincerely wish you good health and new success in your responsible work for consolidating the popular democratic system and achieving the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: U.S. Will Be Responsible for Outbreak of War in Korean Peninsula: Spokesman for FM of DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Will Be Responsible for Outbreak of War in Korean Peninsula: Spokesman for FM of DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry Sunday issued a statement denouncing the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces for mulling kicking off the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises on March 7.
					 The U.S. is working hard to turn the Korean Peninsula into the theater of a war, not content with slapping its unreasonable "sanctions" against the DPRK over its self-defensive H-bomb test and satellite launch for peaceful purposes, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the fact that the U.S. is openly crying out for examining the feasibility of the "beheading operation" and "high-density strike" through the joint military drills which would involve huge forces enough to fight a war.
					
					 This clearly indicates that the projected joint military drills are dangerous war rehearsals which fully reveal their aggressive nature after discarding such cloak as "annual" and "defensive" that has been employed by the U.S. in a trite method.
					
					 The DPRK can never remain a passive onlooker to the U.S. desperate moves to ignite a war of aggression by increasing the danger to extremes in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 In case a war breaks out on this land, it will neither be limited to the peninsula nor will it be a conventional war.
					
					 No one can vouch that the do-or-die confrontation between the DPRK and the U.S. will not spill over to a global thermonuclear war.
					
					 The DPRK will completely turn its mode of military counteraction against the enemy into that of preemptive attack as the situation reached an uncontrollable grave phase.
					
					 A decisive preemptive attack is the only way for the DPRK to beat back the sudden surprise attack of the U.S. ultra-modern military hardware and special units and protect itself as its strategic depth is not long.
					
					 It is quite natural exercise of the right to self-defense for the DPRK to mount a preemptive attack as its counteraction as the U.S. poses an extreme nuclear threat to it after introducing nuclear weapons into south Korea and designating it as part of an "axis of evil" and target of preemptive nuclear strike since long before it had access to nuclear weapons.
					
					 If a war breaks out in the peninsula, the U.S. will be held accountable for igniting the war by mobilizing strategic means and war hardware, regardless of who mounted a preemptive attack.

articles.title: Crucial Statement of KPA Supreme Command Distributed as Official Document of UNSC
articles.content:
Crucial Statement of KPA Supreme Command Distributed as Official Document of UNSC
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- The crucial statement issued by the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army was distributed as UN Security Council's official document A/70/760-S/2016/179 on March 3.

articles.title: Sandy Dust Observed in DPRK
articles.content:
Sandy Dust Observed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- Sandy dust has been observed in the west coastal areas of the DPRK from Saturday afternoon.
					 According to the State Hydro-meteorological Administration, the dust from the Gobi Desert and Inner Mongolian region of China slightly hit Changsong County in North Phyongan Province, Sukchon, Mundok and Jungsan counties in South Phyongan Province, Rinsan County in North Hwanghae Province and Kaephung District in Kaesong City.
					
					 Experts said in advance that the dust would be seen in some west coastal areas and Kangwon Province of the country on Sunday, too.

articles.title: Brass Band Contests of University Students Held
articles.content:
Brass Band Contests of University Students Held
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- There took place brass band contests of university students in Pyongyang at Kim Il Sung Square and the plaza of the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Sunday.
					 Played at the contests revolutionary song "Ode to General Kim Jong Un", "Song of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League", "March of Korean Youth" and other revolutionary and militant numbers.
					
					 After the contests the participants conducted agitation for increased production in the projects for remodeling the Kim Il Sung Stadium and the Pyongyang Trolley Bus Factory, encouraging workers bringing about great leap forward and innovations.

articles.title: Productivity Rises Sharply in Mining Industry of DPRK
articles.content:
Productivity Rises Sharply in Mining Industry of DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- The ongoing 70-day campaign in the DPRK inspires all the employees of mines under the Ministry of Mining Industry to boost the production rapidly.
					 The Changdo Mine carried out its yearly plan at 123 percent while Unhung Mine topped its plan for the first quarter of the year.
					
					 The Alloying Element and Mining management bureaus have carried out their assignments for the campaign at 70 and 45 percent respectively.
					
					 Such increased production is also reported from Unpha, Riwon and many other mines across the country.

articles.title: Food and Consumer Goods Factories Boost Production
articles.content:
Food and Consumer Goods Factories Boost Production
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) --  A number of achievements have been witnessed at factories under the Pyongyang City Management Bureau of Food and Consumer Goods Industries in the DPRK, thanks to the devoted efforts paid by their employees who turn out in the 70-day campaign.
					 The Pyongyang Notebook Factory, the Pyongyang Paper Factory and other factories are speeding up the work to produce school things with locally available raw materials.
					
					 In Pyongyang, the construction of rucksack factory progresses apace.
					
					 The production of intelligent playthings is on steady increase at the Taedonggang Toy Factory which has recently upgraded its equipment like injector.
					
					 The Moran and Ryongbuk foodstuff factories with dust-free production processes have carried out their daily quotas at over 130 percent, while paying deep attention to putting those processes on an unmanned basis. 
					
					 The Songyo Ceramic Factory set up a new production process based on gasification and the Pyongyang Vegetable Processing Factory upgraded its equipment to keep production going on a high level.

articles.title: Preparations for Farming Accelerated
articles.content:
Preparations for Farming Accelerated
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- Agricultural workers of North Hamgyong Province in the DPRK have made many achievements in their preparations for farming.
					 Since the start of the 70-day campaign, more than 220 000 tons of organic fertilizer has been carried to rice paddies and dry fields. And over 90 hectares of farmland has been carpeted with humus soil.
					
					 Provincial leadership bodies worked out detailed plan for the 70-day campaign and fully control the work to concentrate all manpower and means of delivery on preparations for farming.
					
					 Cooperative farms in Hamju County are making their efforts to produce more manure while preparing materials for seedbed, repairing pumping equipment, rearranging waterways and spreading fertile soil on fields.
					
					 Cooperative farms in Jongphyong County, in particular, have over-fulfilled their daily manuring plan 150 percent.
					
					 The same is true of farms in Hamhung and Tanchon cities and Hongwon, Riwon and other counties.

articles.title: Inquiry Report Reveals Abuse of Rights of Women by Park Geun Hye Group
articles.content:
Inquiry Report Reveals Abuse of Rights of Women by Park Geun Hye Group
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Measure Council for Human Rights in South Korea released an inquiry report on Sunday to disclose before the world that the Park Geun Hye group turned south Korea into the worst hell full of discrimination and abuses against women.
					 The report cited the facts to prove in detail that the Park group overlooked the sexual abuses by her master U.S. and Japan, reduced south Korea to the worst tundra of women's rights and sacrificed them for its policy of confrontation with the compatriots in the DPRK. It went on:
					
					 The Park group is zealously patronizing traitor Park Chung-Hee's pro-U.S. criminal history in which it met his personal interests by making many south Korean women provide sex to the GIs.
					
					 "Yusin" dictator Park Chung-Hee set up brothels at the U.S. military bases in south Korea and put sexual slavery for the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces on a legal and institutional basis since the early 1960s.
					
					 At that time the "yusin" dictator regarded the south Korean women as mere scapegoats for courting the U.S. pleasure and an "industry without chimney" for money-making.
					
					 He established a "purification committee for the U.S. military base villages" at Chongwadae in December, 1971. 
					
					 A "measure for purification of the U.S. military base villages" signed by him in 1977 was opened to public in 2013.
					
					 According to it, the direct administrative expenses of the authorities for the women in the base villages were backed by a "special fund of the president" and they used an official term "comfort women for GIs" referring to the women in the base villages. 
					
					 Traitor Park Geun Hye paid no heed to getting apology and reparation from the U.S. in a bid to cover up the "yusin" dictator's treason of conniving at and supporting the sexual slavery for the U.S. troops.
					
					 Park unhesitatingly committed the thrice-cursed act of treachery by covering up the crimes related to the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army in an effort to hush up her father's pro-Japanese acts.
					
					 Park Geun Hye and her clan are following Park Chung-Hee's despicable pro-Japanese acts.
					
					 Park Kun Ryong, brother of Park Geun Hye, openly justified the pro-Japanese acts during his junket to Japan in July last year, saying that to cause a discord with Japan over the issue of the past history was a "shameful behavior."
					
					 Park Geun Hye frequently promised that she would drastically increase the rate of women's involvement in politics and train 100,000 talented women, but it was no more than a cynical ploy to deceive the women.
					
					 The World Economic Forum in its annual "report on the world gender gap" evaluated that the most serious gender discrimination against women was in the south Korean political circle.
					
					 Women in south Korea are subject to the most serious discrimination in their social and economic life.
					
					 Shortly ago, the British magazine Economist was critical of the worst position and working conditions of south Korean women among the countries and regions belonging to the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development by putting together ten indices including wage gap and rate of women holding high posts.
					
					 Marriage and family have become a symbol of misfortune and pain to the south Korean women.
					
					 With the thoughtless introduction of abnormal and corrupt Western culture and lifestyle and undisguised production and distribution of literature and art works in which women are regarded and portrayed as playthings, the number of sex-related crimes of all kinds is on the steady increase.
					
					 In south Korea where infamous "yusin" fascist dictatorship has been revived and democracy and human rights are crudely violated, those women who sympathize or support the north' assertion even a bit have become the primary target of "witch hunting" whether they are south Koreans, overseas Koreans or foreign women.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group does not hesitate to commit crimes against humanity and human rights abuses which sacrifice women hailing from the north for the purpose of the policy of confrontation with the fellow countrymen while detaining them and forcing them to "defect" to the south after abducting them.
					
					 The report branded the Park Geun Hye group as a group of fascists and hideous criminals who are not in a position to talk about human rights as they are ruthlessly abusing rights of women in wanton violation of international law.
					
					 Genuine rights of women can be attained through struggle only, the report said, calling on all the women in the north and the south and abroad to force traitor Park Geun Hye to face the severest punishment by history as she is not entitled to stay among the Korean women.

articles.title: Newspapers Reject UNSC's "Resolution on Sanctions" against DPRK
articles.content:
Newspapers Reject UNSC's "Resolution on Sanctions" against DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers here Sunday resolutely reject the UN Security Council's "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun in an article says that the satellite launch by the DPRK is not an issue to be discussed by others as it is a legal and just measure.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. and some other countries are running the show at the UNSC, conniving at the launch of satellite or inter-continental ballistic missiles of those countries kowtowing to them but disallowing the satellite launch for peaceful purposes by those countries incurring their displeasure.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers wantonly violated the independent right to space development of a sovereign state recognized by international law. This outrageous hostile act indicates that the U.S. strategy of hostility toward the DPRK has reached its height.
					
					 But the U.S. is seriously mistaken.
					
					 The DPRK has manufactured and launched satellites with its own efforts and by its own technology.
					
					 More satellites of Juche Korea would be put on their orbits no matter what others may say and the DPRK will demonstrate its might as a satellite manufacturing and launching state in the future, too.
					
					 Minju Joson in a commentary says that the DPRK will remain unfazed by any "sanctions", stressing the U.S. and other big powers and their followers would be fully accountable for the grave catastrophic consequences to be entailed by the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group Accused of Fabricating Evil Laws against Fellow Countrymen
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group Accused of Fabricating Evil Laws against Fellow Countrymen
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- The "law on human rights in the north" and the "law on anti-terrorism" rammed by the Park Geun Hye group through the puppet National Assembly on March 2 are evil laws aimed to escalate the confrontation with the compatriots in the north so as to prolong the group's remaining days.
					 Minju Joson Sunday says this in a commentary.
					
					 It goes on: This is sparking off the towering resentment of all Koreans as it is an unpardonable grave challenge to the DPRK and a hideous act of treachery pushing the north-south relations to a war.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, the enactment of the above-said fascist laws made the inter-Korean relations hopeless and deprived the progressive and democratic forces in south Korea of the freedom of thinking and activities as they are subject to unprecedented suppression and persecution after being labeled "forces following the north" and "terrorists".
					
					 In order to put an end to unending white terrorism and political terrorism in south Korea and operations for luring and abducting inhabitants of the DPRK, there should be a law for punishing the Park group, the kingpin of terrorism.
					
					 Park can never conceal her ugly colors as heinous confrontational maniac, fascist tyrant without an equal and traitor for all ages no matter how many evil laws she may fake up to ratchet up the confrontation with fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 Now that the Park group has dared challenge the dignity and social system of the DPRK, its service personnel and people will take resolute and strong counter-measures for punishing her group for its hideous crimes against the nation as they had already declared.

articles.title: Preemptive Attack Is Not Monopoly of U.S.: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Preemptive Attack Is Not Monopoly of U.S.: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are mulling staging the largest-ever aggressive Key Resolve and Foul Eagle 16 joint military exercises, not content with spearheading the fabrication of the new brigandish UN "resolution on sanctions" under the pretext of the DPRK's bolstering of nuclear deterrent for self-defence and its legitimate satellite launch.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article and a commentary says that the DPRK's military counteraction is inevitable now that the U.S. imperialists' brigandish aggressive ambition and the puppet warmongers' attempt at invading the north have become obvious.
					
					 It is the determination and will of the DPRK to wipe out by the force of justice the ferocious aggressors and warmongers resorting to the force of injustice bereft of common sense and reason, the article says, and notes:
					
					 To root out the source of aggression and provocation on this land is the DPRK's exercise of the legitimate right to defend the sovereignty of the country and the peace in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The powerful ultra-modern offensive means of the DPRK's revolutionary armed forces have embarked upon carrying out the preemptive operation to thoroughly contain in advance the special operation force and equipment of the enemies involved in the "beheading operation" and "high-density strike" in case they shows a slight sign of movement.
					
					 No force on earth can deter the service personnel and people of the DPRK from making a clean sweep of the warmongers to the last man and winning the final victory of the great war for national reunification.
					
					 A preemptive attack is not a monopoly of the U.S., the commentary notes, warning that if the U.S. recklessly dares attack the DPRK, the former will face such catastrophic disaster as meeting its final doom in face of the latter's nuclear strike of justice.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lays bare Park Geun Hye's Despicable True Colors as Arch Confrontation Maniac
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lays bare Park Geun Hye's Despicable True Colors as Arch Confrontation Maniac 
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and its followers fabricated the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK by abusing the name of the UN Security Council on March 3.
					 Timed to coincide with this ruckus, the Park Geun Hye group of traitors in south Korea issued a "statement", describing the "sanctions" as the "the harshest and comprehensive sanctions" and "strong message".
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 Park's challenge to the DPRK in conspiracy with the U.S. and outside forces touches off towering resentment of all Koreans.
					
					 This discloses the traitor's despicable nature of escalating the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 There is, however, something Park Geun Hye should never forget as she is working so hard to bring unimaginable disasters with naive calculation that everything would turn out as she wishes.
					
					 We do not regard the "sanctions" loudly advertised by the puppet group together with their master U.S. as annoying as fleabite.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces' action of wantonly infringing upon the DPRK's sovereignty and right to existence, together with outside forces, will entail its strong counter-measures. 
					
					 The group of traitors going reckless backed by outside forces is bound to go to a final ruin.

articles.title: Resolution on Action for Peace against War Released
articles.content:
Resolution on Action for Peace against War Released
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a meeting in Seoul on March 3 and released a resolution to take the lead in the action for peace against a war, according to the south Korean internet paper Thongil News.
					 The resolution denounced the U.S. and the south Korean authorities for mulling staging the largest-ever Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises.
					
					 It called upon the youth and students to carry on the struggle for peace against war.
					
					 It reiterated the will to conduct positive activities to preserve the south-north joint declarations and give wide publicity to successes and vitality and make all efforts to realize the exchange between youth and students in the south and the north.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Slam Anti-reunification Forces' Challenge
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Slam Anti-reunification Forces' Challenge 
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- The Japanese Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration issued a special statement on Feb. 26.
					 The statement said:
					
					 U.S. latest weapons and special units are massively introduced into south Korea for staging the largest-ever Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 to be kicked off on March 7.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean warmongers are openly blustering that the war drills are rehearsals for preemptive nuclear attack pursuant to OPLAN 5015 and are aimed to "bring down the social system" of the DPRK through the "beheading operation" to "remove" the supreme headquarters of the north.
					
					 The U.S. should stop the nuclear war racket and roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK and opt for concluding the DPRK-U.S. peace treaty to bring peace and stability to the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- Foreign media dedicated special write-ups to leader Kim Jong Il's birth anniversary from Feb. 14 to 16.
					 The Senegalese newspaper Le Populaire edited an article titled "HE Kim Jong Il's exploits will remain forever in the hearts of humankind" illustrated with his photo.
					
					 The article said that he foiled the imperialist allied forces' moves to stifle the DPRK and firmly protected the sovereignty of the country and the peace and security not only in the Korean Peninsula but in the rest of the world with his unique Songun politics. This is the greatest feat he performed for the triumphant advance of the cause of global independence.
					
					 The Senegalese State Radio aired a similar program.
					
					 The State Radio and F.M.90.5 Radio of Cambodia aired in an article titled "Elder statesman in the world":
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il developed the Workers' Party of Korea into an invincible party which achieved cohesion and unity and experienced and tested, ever-victorious combat ranks on the basis of the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He was possessed of the most successful statesmanship.
					
					 The Myanmar TV Broadcasting screened a Korean film introducing Kimjongilia, flower of the sun, at the prime time.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by German, Indian Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by German, Indian Newspapers
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- German and Indian newspapers dedicated special write-ups to the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The February issue of the German newspaper Rote Fahne carried an article titled "Ushering in new era of independent reunification" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It introduced in detail the indefatigable efforts made by him by wisely leading the work to glorify for all ages President Kim Il Sung's exploits for national reunification by making sure that a monument inscribed with the autograph the President signed on a document related to national reunification during the last period of his life was erected at Panmunjom, symbol of national division.
					
					 Kim Jong Il published famous works such as "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" and "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation" to indicate the bright future of Korea's reunification, it said, adding:
					
					 He is always remembered by the Korean people and progressives as a peerless patriot as he defended the destiny of the country and nation and opened a turning phase for Korea's reunification with his original Songun politics.
					
					 The Indian newspaper Indian and World Event on February 11 devoted two pages to the articles titled "Chairman of National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il and Korea today", "Songun brilliant commander and socialist Korea", accompanied with his photos.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Observed in Thailand, Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Observed in Thailand, Nigeria
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- There took place Korean film shows at different units of Thailand and Nigeria between Feb. 9 and 17 on the occasion of leader Kim Jong Il's birth anniversary.
					 Films shown included Korean films "70th founding anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea celebrated with splendor in presence of respected Comrade Kim Jong Un", "E-library of Kim Il Sung University" and "Masikryong Ski Resort."

articles.title: Crucial Statement of KPA Supreme Command Supported by Angolan Figure
articles.content:
Crucial Statement of KPA Supreme Command Supported by Angolan Figure
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- The international secretary of the Youth Organization of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola issued a statement on Feb. 26 in support of the crucial statement of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 He said that the situation in the Korean Peninsula is going extremely tense that can not be overlooked, owing to the reckless moves of the hostile forces against the DPRK.
					
					 The crucial statement issued by the KPA Supreme Command on the tense situation is winning unanimous support of the world progressives as it reflects the steadfast faith and will of the Korean people to defend the sovereignty of the country, he noted.
					
					 The Youth Organization of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola expresses solidarity with the Korean people in their independent stand, he stressed, wishing them greater success in their drive to build a thriving nation.

articles.title: DPRK Is Full-fledged Space Power: Iranian Newspaper
articles.content:
DPRK Is Full-fledged Space Power: Iranian Newspaper
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- The Iranian newspaper Iran News on Feb. 29 carried an article titled "DPRK is full-fledged space power" illustrated with a photo dealing with the launch of the earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					 The successful launch of Kwangmyongsong-4 attracted the attention of the world media and stirred up the international community in an instant, the article said, adding:
					
					 Many countries have launched satellites, but the satellite launch of the DPRK becomes topic in the world. What is its reason?
					
					 Firstly, the satellite launch of the DPRK conducted under the worst condition is the reality hard to understand.
					
					 The satellite launch is an independent and legitimate right of a sovereign state.
					
					 However, the U.S. and its followers are making desperate efforts to deprive the DPRK of its well-deserved right to satellite launch, bereft of reason.
					
					 Under such situation, the DPRK launched the satellite again.
					
					 Secondly, the DPRK is developing the space in rapid speed.
					
					 The DPRK successfully launched the earth observation satellites in the wake of the two satellite launch tests.
					
					 Thirdly, the DPRK is a space power both in name and in reality.
					
					 There are a few countries launching satellites and having their own satellites in the world, but few countries are putting satellites on their orbit by use of their own launching ramps and carrier rockets.
					
					 But, the DPRK did all entirely relying on its own things, technology and efforts.
					
					 The DPRK is the full-fledged space power.

articles.title: German Organization Accuses Japanese Authorities of Suppressing Chongryon
articles.content:
German Organization Accuses Japanese Authorities of Suppressing Chongryon
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany issued a statement on Feb. 27 in denunciation of the Japanese authorities' suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Japanese ruling forces in conspiracy with the U.S. and south Korea disclosed their true colors.
					
					 Koreans in Japan are not enjoying even the elementary right due to the Japanese authorities' unreasonable moves.
					
					 Of late the Japanese authorities took more sanctions against the DPRK, an independent state, and unilaterally scrapped the agreement it had concluded with the latter.
					
					 They are taking additional sanctions against the DPRK to expand objects to be subject to the fund freeze and restriction of personnel visits and remittance while intensifying suppression of Chongryon.
					
					 We urge the Japanese authorities to immediately stop their suppression of Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: British Political Party's Organ Urges U.S. to Conclude Peace Treaty with DPRK
articles.content:
British Political Party's Organ Urges U.S. to Conclude Peace Treaty with DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- The February issue of Line of March, organ of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), carried an article titled "DPRK's right to safeguard itself and ensure peace".
					 The article disclosed the fact that as soon as the DPRK succeeded in its first H-bomb test, the imperialists headed by the U.S. have intensified their moves to stifle the former.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The imperialists are openly pursuing the policies for bringing down social systems of countries which are not compliant.
					
					 It is quite natural that the DPRK counters such outrages with nuclear weapons.
					
					 But the UN following the U.S. is taking sanctions against the DPRK, a country set to safeguard itself by its own efforts.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which opened up the days of nuclear arms race as today and it is again the U.S. which used nuclear weapons.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to pull their troops out of south Korea and respond to the DPRK's proposal for concluding a peace treaty.
					
					 The world peace-loving forces should put an end to the imperialists' policies for bringing down social system of other countries.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Choummaly Sayasone
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Choummaly Sayasone
Pyongyang, 6 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 6 un mensaje de felicitacion a Choummaly Sayasone, Presidente de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao.
					La misiva senala:
					
					Le hago llegar a Vd. mi calida felicitacion y saludo camaraderil por el aniversario 80 de su cumpleanos.
					
					Estoy complacido de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos partidos y dos paises preparadas por los lideres antecesores se amplian y se desarrollan de continuo en la lucha comun por defender y realizar el ideal socialista.
					
					Deseo de todo corazon a Vd. buena salud y nuevos exitos en sus responsabilidades por la consolidacion del regimen democratico popular y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Portavoz de MINREX de RPDC condena histeria de guerra de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Portavoz de MINREX de RPDC condena histeria de guerra de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 6 de marzo (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 6 una declaracion condenando los ejercicios belicos conjuntos Key Resolve y Foal Eagle 16 a desarrollarse desde el dia 7 por EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos.
					EE.UU. intenta convertir la Peninsula Coreana en una escena caotica de guerra al cabo de "sancionar" con frenesi y sin juicio a la RPDC cuestionando la prueba de la bomba de hidrogeno de autodefensa y el lanzamiento de satelite con fines pacificos de la RPDC, asi revela el documento y continua:
					
					Lo mas intolerable es que el imperio habla abiertamente del examen de realidad de la "operacion de descabezamiento" y el "ataque a modo de pinzas" en los presentes simulacros en que van a participar enormes fuerzas armadas con que puedan ejecutar una guerra entera.
					
					Todo esto demuestra claramente que el imperio yanqui boto siquiera el rutinario rotulo de "caracter anual y defensivo" y revelo abiertamente el caracter agresivo en los presentes simulacros peligrosos.
					
					Nunca podemos estar con brazos cruzados ante esta locura de EE.UU. que intenta provocar la guerra agresiva elevando al maximo el nivel del peligro en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Si estalla la guerra en esta tierra, ella no se limitara solo a la Peninsula Corean ni al uso de las fuerzas armadas  convencionales.
					
					  No hay la garantia de que la confrontacion a vida o muerte  RPDC-EE.UU. no se extendera a la guerra termonuclear mundial.
					
					  Una vez que la situacion se ha hecho muy delicada, nuestro modo del enfrentamiento militar contra los enemigos se convertira en el de ataque preventivo.
					
					  Bajo la condicion de nuestro pais con la poca profundidad estrategica, el unico remedio para neutralizar el ataque sorpresivo de los pertrechos militar de punta y la unidad especial de EE.UU. y defender a si mismo es solo el demoledor ataque preventivo.
					
					  Ya desde hace mucho tiempo en que la RPDC no poseyo las armas nucleares, EE.UU. las introdujo en la Peninsula Coreana y nos definio como "eje del mal" y objeto del golpe preventivo nuclear. Y ahora ejerce la extremada amenaza nuclear contra ella.
					
					Por esta razon, responder con el ataque preventivo es el merecido ejercicio de nuestro derecho de autodefensa.
					
					  Si se desata la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana, la responsabilidad entera recaera sobre EE.UU. que la provoco introduciendo numerosos bienes estrategicos y pertrechos belicos, sin hacer caso de quien de el golpe preventivo.

articles.title: Observado en Corea primer fenomeno de polvos amarillos arenosos de este ano
articles.content:
Observado en Corea primer fenomeno de polvos amarillos arenosos de este ano
Pyongyang, 6 de marzo (ACNC) -- Desde la tarde del dia 5, se observo un fenomeno de polvos amarillos arenosos en la mayor parte de la zona litoral del Mar Oeste de Corea.
					   De acuerdo con el aviso de la Direccion Meteorologica e Hidrologica, este fenomeno anormal meteorologico, surgido en el desierto Gobi y Mongolia Interior de China, afecto poco al distrito de Changsong de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, los distritos de Sukchon, Mundok y Jungsan de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur, el distrito de Rinsan de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte y la zona de Kaephung de la ciudad de Kaesong.
					
					   Los especialistas dicen que hoy dia tambien los polvos amarillos arenosos pasaran por algunas zonas litorales del Mar Oeste de Corea y la provincia de Kangwon.

articles.title: Sociedad de Medidas de DDHH en Sur de Corea revela violacion de DDHH de mujeres de banda de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Sociedad de Medidas de DDHH en Sur de Corea revela violacion de DDHH de mujeres de banda de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 6 de marzo (ACNC) -- La Sociedad de Medidas de DDHH en el Sur de Corea de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 6 un reporte sobre el crimen de la violacion de derechos humanos de mujer de la banda de Park Geun-hye que convirtio el Sur de Corea en el  infierno y escena caotica del desprecio y el maltrato a las mujeres.
					  La nota revela con datos el crimen de haber encubierto el crimen de la esclavitud sexual de sus amos, Estados Unidos y Japon, el crimen antipopular de haber convertido en la tierra esteril de mala fama en el mundo privada de DDHH de mujer y la atrocidad antietica que toma a las mujeres como victimas de la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					  La horda de Park Geun-hye protege insistentemente los actos proyanquis y vendepatrias de Park Chung Hee que satisfizo sus intereses personales vendiendo la castidad conyugal de numerosas mujeres.
					
					  El dictador de "Yusin (renovacion)" es el culpable que legalizo y sistematizo la instalacion de las estaciones sexuales en las bases de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea y el servicio sexual para las tropas agresivas imperialistas yanquis desde el principio de la decada de 1960.
					
					  En aquel entonces, para este dictador de "Yusin" las mujeres surcoreanas no pasan de ser un juguete para atraer la simpatia de su amo gringo y un medio de la ganancia de la "industria sin chimenea".
					
					  El traidor Park Chung Hee instalo hasta el "comite de purificacion para las villas de las bases militares norteamericanas" en Chongwadae en diciembre de 1971. 
					
					En 2013 se dieron a publicidad las "medidas para la purificacion de villas militares", firmadas en 1977 por el dictador de "Yusin".
					
					Segun este documento, se adiciono el "fondo especial del presidente" a los gastos de administracion directa de las autoridades sobre las mujeres de las villas militares de aquel entonces, y las autoridades las llamaban oficialmente como "consoladoras para uniformados norteamericanos".
					
					La traidora Park da espaldas a obtener la disculpa y la indemnizacion merecidas a fin de encubrir la historia proyanqui y vendepatria del dictador de "Yusin" que tolero el crimen de esclavitud sexual para los uniformados norteamericanos. 
					
					Para ocultar los crimenes projaponeses y vendepatrias de su padre Park Chung Hee, prescindio el crimen de esclavitud sexual para el viejo ejercito japones. 
					
					Park Geun-hye y sus familiares continuan la historia vendepatria y projaponesa de su padre. 
					
					Al visitar Japon en julio del ano pasado, Park Kun Ryong, hermana menor de Park Geun-hye, justifico su actitud projaponesa diciendo que es una "verguenza" fomentar la discordia con Japon en cuanto al problema del pasado.
					
					Park Geun-hye expreso reiteradamente la voluntad de "aumentar en gran medida la proporcion de las mujeres en las actividades politicas" y "formar a 100 mil mujeres talentosas", pero esto fue un engano para atraer a las mujeres. 
					
					El "informe mundial sobre la discriminacion sexual", que se publica anualmente por el Forum Economico Mundial, estima que la discriminacion sexual es mas grave en el circulo politico surcoreano. 
					
					Las mujeres surcoreanas reciben el trato de inferioridad no solo en la vida politica sino tambien en la socioeconomica.
					
					Hace poco, la revista britanica Economist critico que en los 10 indices como las diferencias de sueldos y la proporcion de empleadas en alto rango, la posicion y las condiciones de trabajo de las mujeres surcoreanas son mas inferiores que otros paises y regiones ingresados en la Organizacion de Cooperacion Economica y Desarrollo.
					
					Para las mujeres surcoreanas, el casamiento y la familia se consideran como simbolo de desgracias y sufrimientos.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos introducen a sus caprichos la cultura y modos de vida anormales y corruptos de los paises occidentales y permiten la creacion y distribucion de las obras literarias y artisticas que consideran a las mujeres como juguetes de placer, debido a lo cual se incrementan cada dia mas los crimenes sexuales de toda indole. 
					
					En la sociedad surcoreana donde se rehabilita la dictadura fascista de "Yusin" de mala reputacion y se ven exterminados completamente la democracia y los derechos humanos, las mujeres que expresan la minima simpatia por la insistencia de la RPDC, sin distincion de las surcoreanas, las compatriotas en ultramar y las extranjeras, se hacen primer blanco de la "caza de bruja". 
					
					La camarilla de Park Geun-hye comete sin escrupulos los crimenes de lesa humanidad como el secuestro, arresto forzoso y sumision de las mujeres norcoreanas convirtiendolas en las victimas de la politica fratricida.
					
					Esta horda de gangsteres fascistas y criminales, que viola despiadadamente los derechos humanos de las mujeres despreciando brutalmente la ley internacional, no tiene la calificacion de hablar de DDHH.
					
					Los verdaderos derechos humanos de las mujeres se obtienen solo por la lucha. 
					
					Todas las mujeres coreanas en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben dar el castigo mas duro a la traidora Park Geun-hye.
